variants.Description in input context: a truncating nonsense mutation and a missense mutation at a highly conserved amino acid

Material used.Description: Cell culture studies were conducted to examine the functional impact of PINK1 mutations.

Readout description.Result Description: PINK1 mutations lead to increased cellular stress and impaired mitochondrial function.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type PINK1-expressing cells were used as a control.

Basic negative control.Description: PINK1 knockout cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Mitochondrial function greater than 80% of wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Mitochondrial function less than 50% of wild-type levels.
